content: As with most Key Items in the game, however, you may be wondering where to use the Pungent Flesh Chunk. Thankfully you won't have to stray too far from where you obtained it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk'.
The content is as follows:
As with most Key Items in the game, however, you may be wondering where to use the Pungent Flesh Chunk. Thankfully you won't have to stray too far from where you obtained it.
